channel.title: Projects on Carl Müller-Crepon
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Carl Müller-Crepon

item.title: Historical Ethnic Geography (HEG) data
item.description: Collection of time variant data on ethnic geography in Europe from 1886 to 2020.

item.title: State Reach in Africa
item.description: Spatial state reach data for African states since independence, based on travel times to national and regional capitals

item.title: Linking Ethnic Data from Africa (LEDA)
item.description: We interlink 11 ethnic datasets from Africa via the language tree.

item.title: Spatially Interpolated Data on Ethnicity
item.description: Collection of 253 near-continuous maps of local ethno-linguistic, religious, and ethno-religious settlement patterns in 47 countries.

item.title: Regions in independent Africa
item.description: Collection of GIS data on 1st level administrative units, independence - today.

item.title: African road network data
item.description: Time-varying GIS data on road networks from the Michelin map corpus 1966-2017.
